name: Dungeons & Gild
description:
To anyone that finds this, I have been imprisoned by the dungeon trolls. They force me to mine. I do not expect to ever escape, but if by luck this message does, please save me or I will surely perish.

-Yours, Gild

The game is not about escape, but about the narrative of being imprisoned.
This game was made for the #lovejam2019 in an afternoon.
Code, Art, etc - @josefnpat
Music - Arjan <3
